home.tip:
What is LP Token?

LP Token is the certificate of equity held by SunSwap liquidity providers. Users who provide liquidity to SunSwap pools will receive such certificate, which can be used to withdraw tokens from the corresponding pool.
home.title1_tip: Stake LP tokens on SunSwap to earn rewards in TRX and more
home.title2_tip: Stake LP tokens on SunSwap to earn rewards in JST
home.btn_getLP_1: Want more rewards? Go to provide liquidity on
home.total_value_locked_tips: Total value locked includes deposit value, staked value of votes and liquidity mining.
home.banner_context: Stake JST liquidity and earn rewards right away
home.banner_context_end: The previous liquidity mining has ended. For a new round of mining, please go to sun.io ->

tab.wait_tip2: Claim Genesis Mining rewards on (estimated): Sept 17th
tab.auto_tip: Automatically withdrawn to your wallet in a maximum of 7 days

card_modal_add.upcoming_tip: Rewards will be automatically withdrawn to your wallet after staking for 4 weeks.
card_modal_add.frozen_tip: All locked rewards can be unlocked 6 months after the rewards are initially yielded and a certain proportion will be withdrawn automatically to your wallet every 4 weeks.

lend.description: JustLend is the first official lending platform on TRON where users can borrow, lend, deposit assets and earn interests. JustLend是波场网络上的首个官方借贷项目，您可以在其中进行贷款，借出，存储资产并赚取利息。
lend.redtip: Your SUNOLD mining rewards will be staked for a maximum of 7 days before automatically withdrawn to your wallet.
lend.withdrawtip: Click 'Withdraw' button,and the deposit rewards will stop generating.
lend.withdrawtiplus: The supply rewards and mining rewards will stop generating after withdrawal.
lend.withdrawtiplusNew: No supply base rewards or mining bonuses will be generated after withdrawal.
lend.spintip: SUNOLD rewards is growing rapidly. The rewards amount is in proportion to the supply duration and amount.
lend.buttontip:
You will receive both JustLend supply base rewards and SUNOLD mining rewards.
The j{value} you received is an important receipt for your supplied asset. Please think twice before transferring jTRX to a third party!
lend.title_tip2: Automatically withdrawn to the wallet after a maximum of 7 days
lend.tooltip_ex:
Supply APY consists of supply base APY ({value1}%) and supply mining APY ({value2}%).
Your base rewards can be withdrawn anytime along with your supplied asset, and mining rewards (SUNOLD) will be staked for up to 7 days before automatically withdrawn to your wallet.
lend.tooltip_ex1:
Total APY consists of supply base APY ({apy}%) and mining bonuses.
Your base rewards can be withdrawn anytime along with your supplied asset, and mining rewards will be staked for up to 7 days before automatically withdrawn to your wallet.
lend.approveDesc:
Please sign in your wallet
to participate in {token} mining
lend.to_send_tips: Mining rewards will be automatically withdrawn to the wallet at 14:00 the day after the pool ends.
lend.stay: Your supply base rewards are growing steadily. Stay tuned for the next round of dual rewards mining!
lend.lendApyTips: Current SUNOLD mining APY is 0; your supply base rewards are growing steadily.

stake.approveDesc:
Please sign in your wallet
to participate in {token} mining
stake.approveVoteDesc:
Please sign in your wallet
and approve to vote with {token}

index.acc_helphover:
Risk value indicates how risky your asset portfolio is. When the risk value reaches 100, your collaterals will be liquidated.
Risk value = Total borrow ÷ Borrow limit × 100
Net APY = [∑ (Value of Supplied Token × Supply APY) - ∑ (Value of Borrowed Token × Borrow APY) ] ÷ Value of Total Supply
index.my_introduction1: A Decentralized Lending Platform. Supply, Borrow & Earn Anytime.
index.my_introduction4: Connect and sync on TronLink wallet
index.my_introduction6: Supply to provide liquidity and earn high return
index.my_introduction8: Borrow with collaterals, and the borrow interest is dynamically calculated based on liquidity
index.my_introduction13: Borrowing interest refers to the interest that accrues on the outstanding loan and ought to be repaid.
index.return_tip: Rewards consist of supply base rewards and supply mining rewards. Your base rewards can be withdrawn anytime along with your supplied asset, and mining rewards (SUNOLD) will be staked for up to 7 days before automatically withdrawn to your wallet.
index.my_detailRewards_soon_hover: The upcoming rewards will be direcly withdrawn to your wallet every 4 weeks.
index.my_detailRewards_freeze_hover: The mining rewards will be frozen for 24 weeks, 1/6 of which will be unfreezed every 4 weeks and moved under "Upcoming".
index.acc_rewards_hover: Mining rewards consist of TRON-family tokens (from the previous TRON Century Mining) and supply mining rewards. Value of your rewards is calculated based on the latest quote of the currency.

toast.faild_reason:
Possible causes of failure:
· Insufficient Energy or bandwidth, or insufficient TRX balance
· Internet error
· System time is not correctly set on the device
toast.warning_tip: Important reminder: jToken (e.g. jTRX, jUSDT) is an important receipt for your supplied asset. Please think twice before transferring jTOKEN to a third party!

deposit.explanation1: You need to approve before supply or repay {value} to smart contracts.
deposit.explanation2: Need your approval from the wallet
deposit.explanation3: Transaction confirmation failed in the wallet
deposit.explanation4: Transaction sent, waiting for confirmation on-chain

borrow.tip: A kindly reminder, the asset on loan will be enabled as collateral automatically

mortgage.explanation1:
Each asset used as collateral increases your borrow limit.
Please note this may lead to your assets being locked during liquidation.
mortgage.explanation2:
This asset is required to support your borrowed assets.
Either repay borrowed assets, or supply another asset as collateral.
mortgage.borrow_using_tips:
The current asset is on loan.
Cannot turn off ‘Use as collateral’
mortgage.borrow_using:
You cannot unstake your collateral until you repay the loan.
Please try again after your repayment.

market.detail_data_hotdesc: indicates that the asset is featured in supply mining.  Supply this asset for JST rewards!
market.deposit_base_nex: Supply Base APY(in the same token as your supply)
market.deposit_tip: Supply APY consists of supply base APY and supply mining APY. Your base rewards(in the same token as your supply) can be withdrawn anytime along with your supplied asset. Your mining rewards in JST will be automatically withdrawn to your wallet within 7 days.Your mining rewards in JST will be frozen for 24 weeks. Unfreezing starts in a week, and every week 1/24 of the rewards will be unfrozen and moved under "Upcoming".
market.deposit_apy_include: Supply APY consists of "Supply Base APY" + "Supply Mining APY"
market.introduction5:
1. Supply/borrow APY is the APY on your supplied/borrowed assets on JustLend;
Supply mining APY refers to the extra mining rewards in the form of TRON Gift Bag for providing liquidity to the platform;
3. Effective Supply APY = Supply APY + Supply Mining APY; Effective Borrow APY = Borrow APY;
4. Being extra rewards generated from providing liquidity to the platform, supply mining rewards will increase your effective supply income.

vote.title: Governance
vote.subtitle: JustLend community governs the platform by voting to proposals. Users who hold more than 200 million votes can promote a proposal on the platform. If the proposal receives more than 600 million supporting votes plus takes up the majority of the votes, it will be passed and excuted after 2 days' public disclosure.
vote.mywallet_help: All JST holders can co-govern the platform by voting for proposals with their JST tokens.
vote.myvote_help: 1:1 ratio to get votes with JST. You can vote for your favored proposal and revoke the votes you have casted after the voting ended. Your votes remain can be either revoked or cast on other proposals.
vote.backall_subtitle: Voting has concluded. You can revoke the votes you have cast.
vote.backall_done_subtitle: Request for recycling votes enters into effect once confirmed on-chain
vote.approve_text: You need to approve your wallet to access the voting contract when getting votes with JST for the first time.
vote.approve_sign: You need to confirm approval in your wallet
vote.approve_faild_against: Approval failed. Your signature has been rejected.
vote.deposit_tips: Get votes using JST at 1:1 ratio
vote.deposit_subtitle_sign: You need to confirm in your wallet to get votes
vote.deposit_fin_text: You will get votes after confirmation on-chain.
vote.withdraw_text: Get votes using JST at 1:1 ratio
vote.detail_help_how2pass: Proposals receiving more than 600,000,000 votes with the majority being upvotes will be adopted. The approval status bar for proposals that meet requirements will be marked as 100%.
vote.back_text: The voting has ended. You can revoke your votes and vote for other proposals, or withdraw to your wallet.
vote.back_sign_detail: You need to confirm in your wallet
vote.back_fin_text2: Result enters into effect once confirmed on-chain
vote.voteto_vote_Insufficient: Insufficient votes, please get votes first
vote.voteto_explanation: Please complete the below steps if this is your first vote attempt:
vote.voteto_approve_confirm2: You need to confirm the transaction in your wallet
vote.voteto_complete_3_steps: 3 signatures are needed to complete the whole process, please follow the instruction.
vote.voteto_vote_success_detail:
You've voted for Proposal {d} : {s}
Result enters into effect once confirmed on-chain.

wallet.accept_tips: Choosing to connect indicates that you have accepted
wallet.authorize_justlend: You need to confirm in your wallet for connection to JustLend
wallet.use_justlend: Please connect to TronLink wallet to use JustLend

insufficient_tips: Insufficient supply,  please try again later

pre.title: JustLend is Coming！
pre.features_tip: A TRON-Endorsed Decentralized Lending Bank Without Parallel.
pre.feature1_tip:
Fund pool collects all user supplies, which provides more liquidity and ensures the balance of fund system.
Automatically match borrowing needs, generate returns on deposit.
pre.feature2_tip: Supply and withdrawal are allowed anytime. Tightly integrate with TRON DeFi applications and promise immediate, generous returns.
pre.feature3_tip: With full governance handed over to users, the future course of JustLend is decided through voting on proposals.

index_centurymining_banner2: Supply assets and mine for our fat TRON Gift Bag! TRONBULL bringing in the year’s first bounties!
index_centurymining_banner3: Click to Join JST/TRX Liquidity Mining Now!
